Text: I love Skidrow and don't mean to be cruel...but damn have they been getting sloppy lately. Seems like they regularly have to release fixes for their stuff.

Oh c'mon dude don't be like that. We're all taking video games for granted. We're playing something that costs around 70-80 euros for free, so what if it takes a few tries to make it perfect? I personally am very grateful to Skidrow and all the other scenes that crack games I'd otherwise have to pay to enjoy.

brianxxx: so why dont you show'em how its done? since youre obviously much better at it:) I for one am happy with the work skidrow is doing, and if you dont have the time to wait, buy the game!! Thank you skidrow!
@GoatDancer. Where the fuck do you buy your games?, 70-80 euros???? this game is like 50 euros on steam.....

i dont know about stutters or anything, but it certainly works fine. only use for me really was skipping the credits at the start. thanks .dude!
